DOC.brief_summary: This study retrospectively review experience use chloroprocaine postoperative epidural infusion neonates infant . Pain score need intravenous analgesic agent record record demonstrate efficacy technique .
DOC.brief_title: Chloroprocaine Continuous Epidural Analgesia Neonates Infants
DOC.criteria: Neonates infant receive chloroprocaine epidural anesthesia .
